attributes.action: 'abolish,regulate or limit private company access to the Insolvency Website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to:
'abolish,regulate or limit private company access to the
Insolvency Register.'

The Insolvency Register displays the name, d.o.b and address of
everyone in an Individual Voluntary Arrangement or undergoing
bankruptcy.

Unscrupulous and unregulated companies are taking the personal
information of those on the Register and using this to target
these vulnerable members of society. Letters include offers of
further loans and misleading advice.
We would like to regulate or limit access to the Register so
that it can only be used for bona fide reasons and not for the
marketing of unsolicited offers from unregulated companies

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "'abolish,regulate or limit private company access to the Insolvency Website."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17713


Prime Minister's Office
